title: English Education Program for Strengthening Intercultural Communication Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English Communication Skills and Basic Understanding of Cultural Differences
context.additional_context: Designed to cultivate intercultural communication skills required in real job environments for learners preparing to enter healthcare, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can communicate their intentions clearly without linguistic barriers in conversations with people from diverse cultural backgrounds.
Learners can recognize conflict situations arising from cultural differences and utilize appropriate non-verbal communication strategies.
Learners can select and use English expressions considering cultural context in professional scenarios (medical/legal/technical).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
